explains: n. 控告，检举；弹劾；怀疑

sentences.en: To this thing itself I am impeach.
sentences.cn: 对这件事本身我是存疑的。

sentences.en: Richard M. Nixon: They can't impeach me for bombing Cambodia.
sentences.cn: 尼克松：他们不能控告我对柬埔寨的轰炸。

sentences.en: I impeach him in the name and by virtue of those eternal laws of justice, which he has violated.
sentences.cn: 我以他所违背的永恒的正义的法律的名义，并根据这些法律控告他。
